scripts.watch:tailwind: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i assets/style.css -o dist/style.css --watch & npx @tailwindcss/cli -i assets/editor.css -o dist/editor.css --watch
scripts.build:tailwind: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i assets/style.css -o dist/style.css --minify && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i assets/editor.css -o dist/editor.css --minify
